short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Side by side English text for books on Hindawi.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows the English text alongside the Arabic translation on Hindawi.org, of A Scandal in Bohemia, a Sherlock Holmes short story.

Hopefully it can be an engaging resource to practice for those who are learning and trying to improve their Arabic reading skills.

Please share your feedback!

Thank you.

Note: Not affiliated or associated with hindawi.org
